article_title: Ohio Botulism Outbreak? 1 Dead, 20 Sick With Symptoms After Church Potluck
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: ohio, botulism, outbreak, 1, dead, 20, sick, symptoms, after, church, potluck

og.description: One person has died and at least 20 others were sick with symptoms of foodborne Botulism following a weekend church potluck in Ohio.
og.title: 1 Dead, 20 Sick With Botulism Symptoms After Church Potluck
